about_the_game:
[h1]Moons That Belong - Demo[/h1]
Experience a slice of galactic strategy in this free demo of Moons That Belong.

Demo Features:

    []Skirmish Battles: Test your skills against AI opponents in customizable matches.[]Core Gameplay Elements:
      []Strategic node control across various planet types[]Fleet management and routing[]Resource allocation and logistics
    • Tactical combat and defense

What to Expect:

    []Engage in strategic gameplay with a visually appealing interface[]Control planets, manage fleets, and battle opponents
  • Experience a portion of the game's unique art style and animations
Note: This demo offers a limited experience. The full version includes a complete campaign, multiplayer battles, and a scenario editor.
Try the demo now and see if you have what it takes to claim the moons that belong to you!
